# Contribution Guidelines

## Workflow
1. Fork this repository
2. Develop with:
   - ESLint ([afripay-config](https://github.com/AfripayFinance/eslint-config))
   - Minimum 85% test coverage
3. Submit PR with:

```markdown
## Changes
- [ ] Added SEP-31 memo validation
- [ ] Updated documentation

## Testing
Jest coverage: 92%
